thread.section_title: Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: An excellent experience
thread.title_full: An excellent experience - Review of Hotel Manfredi Suite in Rome, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Lysanderraf
title: An excellent experience
text: We loved this hotel. The hotel is an oasis of peace and quiet, even though it located very nearby the Spanish Steps. The hotel gets especially high marks for its location, ambience, quiet, excellent beds and superb breakfast. The staff was incredible and really went out of the rule way to help us optimize our brief visit to Rome. This hotel deserves serious consideration as you consider hotels in Rome.
